            I am a Mathematics PhD candidate at the University of California, Santa Barbara.
            Currently I am learning about Environmental Data Science by taking classes at UCSB’s Bren School of Environmental Science and Management.
            After obtaining my PhD I would like to use my mathematics and coding background to become part of an interdisciplinary working group that addresses environmental issues.
            In my free time I love birding and trying out new hiking trails in Santa Barbara.
